rows.label: tlk41100141_04_msg0001
rows.name: I came up with a great idea.

rows.label: tlk41100141_04_msg0002
rows.name:
A way to avoid war, so there won't be
any more war orphans like me.

rows.label: tlk41100141_04_msg0003
rows.name: Don't get involved with other Divine Beasts at all!

rows.label: tlk41100141_04_msg0004
rows.name:
If we were in Invidia,
we just wouldn't ever leave this Divine Beast.

rows.label: tlk41100141_04_msg0005
rows.name:
If we don't interact with other countries,
war can't happen, right?

rows.label: tlk41100141_04_msg0007
rows.name: There's a country that already tried that?!

rows.label: tlk41100141_04_msg0009
rows.name:
W-Well, I guess an idea that even I
could come up with was never going to work...
